co.cask.cdap.api.app

Interface ApplicationConfigurer


  • public interface ApplicationConfigurer
    Configures a CDAP Application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDatasetModule(String moduleName, Class<? extends DatasetModule> moduleClass)
      Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance) during application deployment.
      void addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
      Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance) during application deployment, using Dataset as a base for the DatasetModule.
      void addFlow(Flow flow)
      Adds a Flow to the Application.
      void addMapReduce(MapReduce mapReduce)
      Adds a MapReduce job to the Application.
      void addSchedule(Schedule schedule, SchedulableProgramType programType, String programName, Map<String,String> properties)
      Adds a Schedule to the specified program in the Application
      void addService(Service service)
      Adds a custom Service to the Application.
      void addSpark(Spark spark)
      Adds a Spark job to the Application.
      void addStream(Stream stream)
      Adds a Stream to the Application.
      void addWorker(Worker worker)
      Adds a Worker to the Application.
      void addWorkflow(Workflow workflow)
      Adds a Workflow to the Application.
      void createDataset(String datasetName, Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass, DatasetProperties props)
      Adds a Dataset instance, created automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance), deploying a Dataset type using the datasetClass parameter as the dataset class and the given properties.
      void createDataset(String datasetName, String typeName, DatasetProperties properties)
      Adds a Dataset instance, created automatically if absent in the CDAP instance.

      Sets the Application's description.
      void setName(String name)
      Sets the Application's name.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Sets the Application's name.
        Parameters:
        name - The Application name

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(String description)
        Sets the Application's description.
        Parameters:
        description - The Application description

      • addStream

        void addStream(Stream stream)
        Adds a Stream to the Application.
        Parameters:
        stream - The Stream to include in the Application

      • addDatasetModule

        @Beta
void addDatasetModule(String moduleName,
                         Class<? extends DatasetModule> moduleClass)
        Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance) during application deployment.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Name of the module to deploy
        moduleClass - Class of the module

      • addDatasetType

        @Beta
void addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
        Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance) during application deployment, using Dataset as a base for the DatasetModule. The module will have a single dataset type identical to the name of the class in the datasetClass parameter.
        Parameters:
        datasetClass - Class of the dataset; module name will be the same as the class in the parameter

      • createDataset

        @Beta
void createDataset(String datasetName,
                      String typeName,
                      DatasetProperties properties)
        Adds a Dataset instance, created automatically if absent in the CDAP instance. See DatasetDefinition for details.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - Name of the dataset instance
        typeName - Name of the dataset type
        properties - Dataset instance properties

      • createDataset

        void createDataset(String datasetName,
                 Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass,
                 DatasetProperties props)
        Adds a Dataset instance, created automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance), deploying a Dataset type using the datasetClass parameter as the dataset class and the given properties.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - dataset instance name
        datasetClass - dataset class to create the Dataset type from
        props - dataset instance properties

      • addFlow

        void addFlow(Flow flow)
        Adds a Flow to the Application.
        Parameters:
        flow - The Flow to include in the Application

      • addMapReduce

        void addMapReduce(MapReduce mapReduce)
        Adds a MapReduce job to the Application. Use it when you need to re-use existing MapReduce jobs that rely on Hadoop MapReduce APIs.
        Parameters:
        mapReduce - The MapReduce job to include in the Application

      • addSpark

        void addSpark(Spark spark)
        Adds a Spark job to the Application.
        Parameters:
        spark - The Spark job to include in the Application

      • addWorkflow

        void addWorkflow(Workflow workflow)
        Adds a Workflow to the Application.
        Parameters:
        workflow - The Workflow to include in the Application

      • addService

        void addService(Service service)
        Adds a custom Service to the Application.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to include in the Application

      • addWorker

        void addWorker(Worker worker)
        Adds a Worker to the Application.
        Parameters:
        worker - The worker to include in the Application

      • addSchedule

        void addSchedule(Schedule schedule,
               SchedulableProgramType programType,
               String programName,
               Map<String,String> properties)
        Adds a Schedule to the specified program in the Application
        Parameters:
        schedule - the schedule to be included for the program
        programType - the type of the program
        programName - the name of the program
        properties - the properties for the schedule
